Package com.conways_game_of_life.app.rest.controller

Interface GameController

All Known Implementing Classes:
GameControllerImpl
public interface GameController
The GameController interface represents the Controller for Conway's Game of Life It handles the working of the Model GameModel by parsing the game properties and user actions to the model and conveys action outcomes to the user in some form.

  • Method Details

    • getPage

      String getPage()
      The landing page for the backend server with details to public endpoints.
      Returns:
      a string representing API details.

    • editGameBoardSize

      void editGameBoardSize(GameBoard board) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Changes game board size.
      Parameters:
      board - a record class GameBoard representing dimensions of the game board.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if null or invalid input provided.

    • randomBoard

      void randomBoard()
      Creates a randomized initial board for the game.

    • toggleCell

      void toggleCell(Cell cell) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Toggles a cell in the game board from live to dead and vice-versa.
      Parameters:
      cell - a record class Cell representing coordinated of the cell in the game board.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if null or invalid input provided.

    • getGameBoard

      boolean[][] getGameBoard()
      Gets the current game board.
      Returns:
      the current game board.

      void nextGeneration()
      Executes the next generation in the game.

    • isGameOver

      boolean isGameOver()
      Checks if the game is over(reached extinction) or now.
      Returns:
      true if game reached extinction else false.

    • resetGame

      void resetGame()
      Resets the game with an empty civilization of the same size as before.
